text: I have a blog template issue...when I view the front page of this blog, the dates and times show up. But when I click into the blog, they all just say "May 2019", not the actual date. Here's the site for reference: <https://www.switchfly.com/blog>
look at the datetimeformat filter here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters>
